author: Steve McCaskill
title: UK government can use phone tracking data to stop infection spread
description: ICO says data analysis is legal, and could now be used to control virus infections.
content:
Any government plan to use anonymised mobile phone location data to help tackle the spread of coronavirus would be legal, the UK privacy regulator has ruled.
